Frequently asked questions
## What is a cryptocurrency exchange?
A cryptocurrency exchange is a platform where you can buy, sell, and trade digital assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum. Our platform also offers features like copy trading, futures, and earning opportunities to suit all experience levels.
## What products and services do you offer?
We offer a range of products:
  * Spot trading: Buy and sell crypto instantly
  * Futures trading: Trade with up to 100x leverage
  * Earn: Grow your portfolio through staking and savings


## How can I get started?
Getting started is simple:
  * Sign up using email, Gmail, or Apple ID
  * Complete KYC for added security and full access
  * Deposit funds and start trading on our user-friendly platform


## Is completing KYC required?
Yes, completing KYC is required for account security and to access all platform products and features. Additionally, completing KYC unlocks exclusive rewards like our $888 rewards program.

Globe is carving out its niche in the world of cryptocurrency by positioning itself as the “Coinbase for derivatives.” Founded in 2018 and part of the Y Combinator W19 batch, this Seychelles-based startup has quickly made a name for itself. Why? Well, it’s got a few tricks up its sleeve, including the invention of the Bitcoin VIX and the establishment of the first low-latency perpetual futures exchange.

With a team of about 20, Globe has grown into a vibrant marketplace with over 200,000 active traders and a trading volume that has topped an astounding $30.31 billion to date. They support more than 300 cryptocurrencies, allowing users to dive into an ocean of trading opportunities across different markets.

What can you actually do on Globe? The platform offers a range of features aimed at both new and experienced traders. You can buy cryptocurrencies effortlessly with a credit or debit card, engage in spot trading for immediate transactions, and explore the exciting world of futures trading with leverage of up to 100x. Plus, they have staking options to help you grow your crypto portfolio. Now, that's a comprehensive offering.

The company is heavily involved in decentralized finance (DeFi) and fintech, aiming to deliver a user-friendly and secure trading experience that doesn't compromise on performance. They’ve put a clear emphasis on security, requiring KYC verification to unlock full access to their platform and exclusive rewards.

If you’re considering jumping into crypto or looking to enhance your trading game, Globe presents an attractive option with its robust feature set and commitment to a best-in-class trading experience. You can learn more or get started at their [website](https://globe.exchange).

So, whether you're looking to manage derivatives like a pro or just dabble in crypto, keep an eye on Globe. They’re making moves that could change the landscape of crypto trading.
